What to say if you see someone afflicted.ARABIC_TEXT: ((الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ الَّذِي عَافَانِي مِمَّا ابْتَلاَكَ بِهِ، وَفَضَّلَنِي عَلَى كَثِيرٍ مِمَّنْ خَلَقَ تَفْضِيلاً)).
What to say if you see someone afflicted.LANGUAGE_ARABIC_TRANSLATED_TEXT: (Alhamdu lillahil-lathee AAafanee mimmab-talaka bih, wafaddalanee AAala katheerin mimman khalaqa tafdeela.)
What to say if you see someone afflicted.TRANSLATED_TEXT: (All praise is for Allah Who saved me from that which He tested you with and Who most certainly favoured me over much of His creation.)
